headline: The perfect pair: These bestselling memory foam trainers on Amazon are as 'comfy as bedroom slippers' - and they're on sale for under £35

previewText: SHOPPING: If you're on the hunt for the most comfortable trainers, right now, the Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers are on sale for £34.90, marked down from £54 on Amazon.

articleText.content: SHOPPING: Products featured in this article are independently selected by our shopping writers. If you make a purchase using links on this page, MailOnline will earn an affiliate commission.

If you're on the hunt for the most comfortable trainers for walking or standing all day, you'll want to take advantage of this Amazon deal. Right now, the Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers are on sale for £34.90, marked down from £54.

Skechers are one of the most popular footwear brands around, famed for their foam cushioning, elastic cuffs and light-as-air design.

Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers (Black Mesh White Trim) 

Along with sporty mesh fabric outer, the trainers are designed with cushioned comfort insoles and a lightweight, flexible, shock-absorbing midsole to provide ample support while reducing stress on your feet.

Moulding to your feet for ample arch support, they'll also help lessen the impact on your ankles, feet, knees and hips.

£34.90 (save £19.10)Shop

Each pair has been crafted with high-quality materials for ultimate support and comfort. And the brand's number one bestselling Summits Sneaker is no exception.

Pairing perfectly with everything in your wardrobe, from office to athleisure wear, the slip-on Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers have become a fan favourite on Amazon.

articleText.caption: Right now, the Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers are on sale for £34.90 on Amazon, marked down from £54

articleText.content:
With more than 9,000 five-star ratings from retail and care workers to nurses alike who stand and walk around all day, the Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers have earned the number one bestselling spot in the retailer's Women's Fashion Trainers chart.

Wearers declare the cushioned memory foam comfort insole makes them 'comfy as bedroom slippers' and 'like waking on a cloud'. Others note how they no longer suffer from heel pain after a long shift.

'Very comfortable pair,' one customer shared. 'I'm an RN, and I stand on my feet for hours. Since I bought these, I have not been having any heel pain anymore.'

'Oh boy, where have these been all my life,' another user said. 'Why didn't friends tell me about them every time I complained about sore feet. Just bought a second pair of white with silver trim after wearing the black for a couple of weeks.

'No more first priority of shoes off in seconds after getting home, these are so so comfy, lightweight, breathable, and the arch support with memory foam is awesome.'

They added: 'Normally takes a while for my feet to adjust to new shoes of any kind but not these, good to go from the first wearing. These have been a foot revolution for me.'

articleText.caption: Wearers declare the cushioned memory foam comfort insole makes them 'comfy as bedroom slippers' and 'like waking on a cloud'

articleText.content:
Along with sporty mesh fabric outer, the trainers are designed with cushioned comfort insoles and a lightweight, flexible, shock-absorbing midsole to provide ample support while reducing stress on your feet.

Moulding to your feet for ample arch support, they'll also help lessen the impact on your ankles, feet, knees and hips.

The Skechers Women's Summits Sneakers are available in sizes UK three to eight, and there are more than five different colourways to pick from, including grey, sage and navy, all of which are on sale with up to 39 per cent off.
